EmailTemplate.name: MATCHING Associate availability - No reply
EmailTemplate.subject: Availability for interview - No response received
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Availability for Interview No response received
Hello {!Step_Forward_Associate_Attendance__c.Associate_First_Name__c},
We havenâ€™t received a response to our last 2 emails regarding an interview with a Step Forward employer. Unfortunately you are no longer eligible for this interview and we cannot guarantee that we can re-arrange this for you.
Please contact our office to discuss your future availability and any other questions you may have about interviews.
All the best,
Step Forward Matching Team
020 3542 2404
stepforward.interview@the-challenge.org
(You can't reply to this email but you can send a new one to the address above)
www.stepforward.uk.com
